original_text: And the king called for Jehoiada the chief, and said unto him, Why hast thou not required of the Levites to bring in out of Judah and out of Jerusalem the collection, according to the commandment of Moses the servant of the Lord, and of the congregation of Israel, for the tabernacle of witness?
korean_text: 왕이 대제사장 여호야다를 불러 이르되 네가 어찌하여 레위 사람들을 시켜서 여호와의 종 모세와 이스라엘의 회중이 성막을 위하여 정한 세를 유다와 예루살렘에서 거두게 하지 아니하였느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: And the king called for Jehoiada the chief
Why hast thou not required of the Levites
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 너는 레위 사람들에게 요구하지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: to bring in out of Judah and out of Jerusalem
according to the commandment of Moses the servant of the Lord
and of the congregation of Israel
